ModMetaData.name: Stuffified Construction
ModMetaData.author: Sixdd
ModMetaData.description:
This mod makes more things able to be built from stuff. Also adds new types of wood to vanilla and Vegetable Garden trees. No more generic "wood" from every type of tree! YAY!\n\n Also attempts to capitalize every proper name in the game, because reasons.
Mod Version: 0.17.1.0
